column3:
comment:"Very useful for ironing men's suits without ruining their shapes. Normal press iron ruins the shape of the coats. Also useful for women's fancy dresses which are almost impossible to iron with the normal press.

Takes around 30 seconds to reach full steam throw.
Not too heavy
Wire length around 2 meter
Steam throw around 2 feet
Images attached of coat with one side steamed but the other without for comparison.
Holding in hand for size comparison."}
column6:
comment:"It's a very handy and smart steamer. It works greatüëç The plus point is you can steam the clothes in less time as compared to iron. It's an advice to all the buyers to use filtered water in the steamer to make it long lasting.
‚Ä¢ Original product with warranty card.
‚Ä¢ Daraz delivered it in the described time.
‚Ä¢ But delivery charges should be less because 499/- delivery charges over 6800/- product isn't fine for me."}

column156: comment:"The piece of dawlance steamer i received from dawalance official page and daraz mall is brand new but DEFECTIVE AT ALL. If u compare its steam throw with what i have seen by myself or u can see on youtube reviews. My steamer throw is even minimum than 1 feet. And it throws steam with no balance kbhi bht kam kabhi thori normal. Aur saray outlets say steam b thek say nhi shawer horahi. It was a weeding gift and i feel ashamed for ordering it coz for first time i got defective product from two official names. Thanks god that item can be returned. But question is that why dawlance sent me not properly functional  & working item...(i am a loyal daraz customer purchased a dozen of expensive items varying from automatic washing machine\n dawlance expensive oven of 27000. Many mobiles and much more. Never got defective item but only the last one dawlance garment steamer. Therefore returned item and now in waiting process for a refund..."}
